channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 10th November
item.description:

item.title: Street Lamp is not working for long time., 10th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Beaconsfield Road, Mottingham, London
